# GameCaptureUnityPlugin
Capture the game screen of Switch and other hardware.  
You will be able to utilize screen and sound on unity.

![Sample](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/68218961/359829692-3dee8419-6732-402b-bbd9-8435bbb43000.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..tWx2fVXeEygb7d3zv_gJL6F0OM3-1xz4w-fEcvOCzlg)

# Requirement
You must prepare a capture board to connect to the hardware : e.g. Nintendo Switch.

![SettingSample](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/68218961/359896413-6f975a21-4000-4397-abf4-7433f2360b5d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..7diuMx1g9h3PalWkCiJLBto3_CNVzwNkQJeOVTh9c-Q)

# Development environment
Unity 2022.3.42f1

# Verified OS

Windows 11  
Ubuntu 22.04 (I will verify in the future)
